LOGIN_SCREEN_WELCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome back adventurer! Enjoy your journey in Argentum Online!
MENSAJE_RECHAZO_ATAQUE_ESCUDO: You blocked the attack with your shield.
MENSAJE_USUARIO_RECHAZO_ATAQUE_ESCUDO: The user blocked the attack with their shield.
MENSAJE_USAR_MEDITANDO: You are meditating! Stop meditating to use items.
MENSAJE_SEGURO_PARTY_ON: No one can invite you to a party now.
MENSAJE_SEGURO_PARTY_OFF: You can now receive party invitations.
MENSAJE_GOLPE_CABEZA: The creature hit you on the head for
MENSAJE_GOLPE_BRAZO_IZQ: The creature hit your left arm for
MENSAJE_GOLPE_BRAZO_DER: The creature hit your right arm for
MENSAJE_GOLPE_PIERNA_IZQ: The creature hit your left leg for
MENSAJE_GOLPE_PIERNA_DER: The creature hit your right leg for
MENSAJE_GOLPE_TORSO: The creature hit your torso for
MENSAJE_RECIVE_IMPACTO_CABEZA: hit you on the head for
MENSAJE_TRABAJO_PESCA: Click on the spot where you want to fish...
MENSAJE_DEBES_ELEGIR_EL_MOTIVO_DE_TU_CON: You must choose the reason for your inquiry.
MENSAJE_EXPLIQUE_CORRECTAMENTE_EL_MOTIVO: Please explain the reason for your inquiry correctly!
MENSAJE_DEJE_EL_NOMBRE_DEL_PERSONAJE_Y_A: Leave the name of the character for which you are requesting relief along with the administrator involved.
MENSAJE_SE_PRIORIZARA_CONSULTA_A_ADMINIS: Priority will be given to your inquiry by sending a message to the connected administrators. Please use this option responsibly.
MENSAJE_SUGERENCIA_LEIDA_Y_TOMADA_EN_CUE: Your suggestion WILL be read by a staff member and taken into account for future changes.
MENSAJE_EXPLIQUE_DETALLADAMENTE_EL_ERROR: Explain in detail how to reproduce the issue. The programming staff will resolve it as soon as possible.
MENSAJE_DEJE_DATOS_POSIBLES_PARA_CONSULT: Provide as much data as possible. This option is for inquiries that do not fit into other sections.
MENSAJE_QUEJA_HACIA_MIEMBRO_DEL_STAFF: In the case of a complaint against a staff member, specify the staff member involved and the reasons, providing all possible details.
MENSAJE_NO_PODES_AGARRAR_OBJETOS_MIENTRA: You cannot pick up items while trading.
MENSAJE_NO_PODES_TIRAR_OBJETOS_MIENTRAS_: You cannot drop items while trading.
MENSAJE_DESACTIVAR_SEGURO_CON_SEG: To deactivate the safety, type /SEG or use the button in the MENU tab in the lower-right corner.
MENSAJE_PEZ_ROMPIO_LINEA_PESCA: The fish broke your fishing line.
MENSAJE_NO_TIENE_CREDITOS_SUFICIENTES: You do not have enough credits to buy that item. You can upgrade your subscription at the following link: https://www.patreon.com/nolandstudios/membership
MENSAJE_NO_TIENE_ITEM_SELECCIONADO: You have not selected any item.
MENSAJE_PEZ_ROMPIO_LINEA_PESCA_DUPLICADO: The fish broke your fishing line.
MENSAJE_AGUA_POCO_PROFUNDA_BARCA_PODRIA_: Attention! The water is shallow; your boat could break. You can only walk.
MENSAJE_TERRENO_ROCOSO_BARCA_PODRIA_ROMP: Attention! The terrain is rocky; your boat could break. You can only swim.
MENSAJE_LA_CANTIDAD_DEBE_SER_MAYOR_A_0: The amount must be greater than 0.
MENSAJE_CLICK_DONDE_DESEAS_TRABAJAR: Click where you want to work...
MENSAJE_SELECCIONA_PERSONAJE_A_MARCAR: Select the character you want to mark...
MENSAJE_DEBES_ELEGIR_EL_MOTIVO_DE_TU_CON: You must choose the reason for your inquiry.
